casebody.data:
NRG REMA LLC, and BTU Solutions Group, LLC, Plaintiffs-Cross-Respondents,
v.
CREATIVE ENVIRONMENTAL SOLUTIONS CORP., Defendant-Cross-Petitioner,
and
Site Enterprises, Inc., Defendants,
and
Sims Metal East LLC, d/b/a Sims Metal Management, et al., Defendants. Creative Environmental Solutions Corp., Plaintiff-Cross-Petitioner,
v.
NRG REMA LLC, a/k/a NRG Energy and BTU Environmental Solutions LLC, a/k/a BTU Solutions Group, BTU Solutions De, LLC, BTU State Line, LLC, BTU Project Management, LLC, BTU Environmental Services, LLC, and BTU Solutions Group, LLC, Defendants-Cross-Respondents,
and
Site Enterprises, Inc., Defendant,
and
Sims Metal East LLC, d/b/a Sims Metal Management, et al., Defendants. C-8 September Term 2018
081247 Supreme Court of New Jersey. September 12, 2018

ORDER

A cross-petition for certification of the judgment in A-5432-15 and A-0567-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the cross-petition for certification is denied, with costs.
